content: this crochet washcloth is crafted from soft and absorbent cotton yarn making it perfect for gentle cleansing the texture of the washcloth provides both exfoliation and comfort to pamper yourself choose your color to match your decor pattern includes instructions for an 8 and 9 washcloth materials needed #4 cotton yarn about 90 yds us g hook 4mm tapestry needle for weaving ends if you would like to join my facebook group to share your make www facebook com/groups/simplymelaniejane sign up for my newsletter here https //bit ly/smjnewsletter *this pattern and its images are copyright protected and the sole property of simply melanie jane please do not redistribute transfer or sell the pattern or alter it to claim as your own you may sell any products you create from this pattern please credit the designer by linking online listings *
